<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<descriptor id="ANSYS" filled="true"><options name="base.parameter" info="基本参数" id="basic" narrow="false"><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" label="作业名称" id="JOB_NAME" helpText="" follower="null" width="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="核数" id="NCPU" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"><option id="2" selected="false">2</option><option id="4" selected="true">4</option><option id="6" selected="false">6</option><option id="8" selected="false">8</option><option id="16" selected="false">16</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="队列" id="QUEUE" helpText="" follower="" defaultValue="undefined" hidden="false"><option id="ansys" selected="true">ansys</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="是否支持图形界面" id="CONSOLE_SUPPORT" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"><option id="Yes" selected="false">Yes</option><option id="No" selected="true">No</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="许可证类型" id="ansys_product" helpText="" follower="" defaultValue="" hidden="false"><option id="ansys" selected="false">Mechanical</option><option id="ane3fl" selected="false">Multyphysics</option><option id="ane3" selected="false">Mechanicalemag</option><option id="nls" selected="false">Professional NLS</option><option id="dsdxm" selected="false">DesignXplorer</option><option id="meba" selected="true">Mechbatch</option></option></options><options name="application.parameter" info="应用参数" id="app" narrow="true"><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="内存构架" id="MEMARC" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"><option id="Sequential" selected="false">Sequential</option><option id="SMP" selected="false">SMP</option><option id="DMP" selected="true">DMP</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.list" required="false" label="ANSYS版本" id="VERSION" helpText="" follower="" defaultValue="undefined" hidden="false"><option id="14.5" selected="false">14.5</option><option id="请选择" selected="false">请选择</option><option id="17.2" selected="true">17.2</option></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" label="迭代次数" id="ITE_NUM" helpText="" follower="null" width="null" defaultValue="100" hidden="false"></option></options><options name="inputfile.parameter" info="输入文件" id="file" narrow="false"><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.remotelocate.file" required="false" label="计算输入文件(.inp .db .cdb)" id="TXT_INPUT_FILE" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.remotelocate.file" required="false" label="加载case输入文件" id="CASE_INPUT_FILE" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.remotelocate.file" required="false" label="宏" id="MACRO_FILE" helpText="" follower="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"></option></options><options name="install.application.parameter" info="应用程序安装参数" id="mandatory" narrow="false"><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" label="Ansys命令行" id="ANSYS_CMD" helpText="ANSYS_CMD:Fluent,install,directory. For exsample:/app/ansys_inc/v121/fluent/bin/fluent" follower="null" width="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"></option><option xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cloud.app.option.type.text" required="false" label="Ansys许可证文件" id="LM_LICENSE_FILE" helpText="LM_LICENSE_FILE:full,path,to the ANSYS license file. 1555@chnshas1016" follower="null" width="null" defaultValue="" hidden="false"></option></options></descriptor>
